sakurroseawine.name: Sakura Rose Wine
sakurroseawine.desc: A limited series of wine is created every year specially for the festival of Sakura-tree in Transcarpathia. Made from Pinot Noir grapes harvested on the southern side of the Chateau Chizay vineyards.

yakitori.name: Yakitori
yakitori.desc: This Yakitori consists of bite-sized pieces of chicken meat served on a bamboo skewer.

omurice.name: Omurice
omurice.desc: This omurice consists of an omelette made with fried rice and thin, fried scrambled eggs

hojicha.name: Hojicha
hojicha.desc: Low in caffeine, delicious, and an alternative to coffee!

taiyaki.name: Taiyaki
taiyaki.desc: Fish-shaped cake with a read bean paste filling.

sushi.name: Sushi
sushi.desc: Seafood is great! You should try it out

bento.name: Bento
bento.desc: Hey, hey! Can I take some of your rice?

dango.name: Dango
dango.desc: A dumpling made from rice flour mixed with uruchi rice flour and glutinous rice flour

tempura.name: Tempura
tempura.desc: Tempura is a dish of battered and fried fish, seafood, or vegetables. This one has vegetables.

kaiseki.name: Kaiseki
kaiseki.desc: A course comprised of small, seasonally themed dishes crafted with the utmost precision and attention to detail

tsukemono.name: Tsukemono
tsukemono.desc: Traditional pickles that have been eaten in Japan since prehistoric times. Extremely healthy too!

soba.name: Soba
soba.desc: Very delicious & healthy, Also similar to Udon.
